title: Var
description: Retrieve data from the provided data object.

items.title: Default
items.description: You can supply a default, as the second argument, for values that might be missing in the data object.

oneOf.title: Shortcut
oneOf.description: If you like, we support syntactic sugar to skip the array around single arguments.
